author: Source: KSDK-TV Saint Louis
title: Review: Apple adds 4K to smaller iMac - KSDK-TV Saint Louis
text:
Review: Apple adds 4K to smaller iMac The smallest iMacs get a 4K Retina option; accessories now have rechargeable batteries. Check out this story on KSDK.com: http://usat.ly/1LssYkQ NEW YORK - Apple's recent upgrade to Mac OS X El Capitan represents a solid but by no means groundbreaking advance.
Start the conversation, or Read more at KSDK-TV Saint Louis.
